This includes Personal Information collected at our retail

our marketing communications, contests, surveys, loyalty programs and

This Privacy Policy outlines how we collect, use, retain, and disclose your
Personal Information, how you can access and update your Personal Information
and how to contact us for privacy related questions or concerns.

By providing your Personal Information to Giant Tiger and continuing to use
Giant Tiger, you consent to the collection, use and disclosure of your
Personal Information for the purposes described in this Privacy Policy and/or
the purposes presented to you at the time of collection.

When you visit our websites, sign up for, participate in or purchase a
specific product, service, program, consent, promotion, survey or event
through Giant Tiger, additional terms and conditions may be provided regarding
how we collect, use, retain, and disclose your Personal Information collected
in respect of that product, service, program, consent, promotion, survey or
event.
For example, this can include your name, email, phone number, and purchase history.

* We may [collect your Personal Information](https://help.gianttiger.com/en-US/privacy-policy-107377#c-how-we-collect-your-personal-information) to provide you with products and services when you make a purchase at Giant Tiger (in store or online), and to send you offers tailored to your interests, for example, when you sign up for our loyalty program.

If we tie non-personal
information that we collect to your Personal Information, that information
becomes Personal Information.

Personal Information is only collected with your consent and will only be used
for the purposes disclosed at the point of collection or as set out in this
Privacy Policy, unless otherwise required by law.

## C. How We Collect Your Personal Information

Giant Tiger collects Personal Information from you to provide you with
products and services when you make a purchase at Giant Tiger (in store or
online), and to send you offers tailored to your interests, for example, when
you sign up for our loyalty program.

The Personal Information we collect may include, but is not limited to, your
name; physical address; telephone number; email address; purchase details;
payment information; language, store and shopping preferences; birthday or age
range; household composition; and gender.

### How We Collect Personal Information in Our Stores

We may collect Personal Information from you at our retail stores when you:

  * Make an in-store purchase
  * Pick up a purchase made online
  * Ask for a refund or exchange a product
  * Sign up to receive communications from Giant Tiger
  * Sign up for our loyalty program
  * Participate in a contest or promotion at our stores or online
  * Sign up to participate in a marketing survey or focus group
    * Your participation in focus groups may be recorded
  * Contact or ask for help from Customer Service
  * Apply for employment with us
    * If you have questions on how we protect information collected, used or disclosed for recruitment or employment purposes, please contact our Privacy Office

This information can include your name, email address, physical address,
payment information, a signature and/or identification check (e.g., to pick up
a purchase or return a product), telephone number and purchase details.

We may also ask you for Personal Information to protect against fraud (e.g.,
identity theft), loss prevention or to comply with legal requirements.

For example:

  * _Western Union_ to provide money transfer services in select Giant Tiger stores
  *  _We Financial_ to provide reloadable prepaid credit card services in select Giant Tiger stores
  * Shipping vendors to complete deliveries of our products to our stores or your specified location

These organizations may collect your Personal Information (e.g., name,
address, phone number, email and purchase information) when you purchase their
products or in order to provide you with services.

The information they
collect is subject to their own privacy policies, while any information
collected and handled by Giant Tiger employees will continue to be subject to
this Privacy Policy.

### How We Collect Personal Information Over the Phone

We may collect Personal Information from you over the phone (for example, if
you call Customer Service or send us a text message) when you:

  * Ask us a question
  * Have a complaint about a product or service
  * Ask for a refund or exchange of a product purchased
  * Have technical issues with one of our websites or your GT ID account
  * Would like to receive a link to sign up for our loyalty program

### How We Collect Personal Information On Our Websites

We may collect Personal Information from you through our websites when you:

  * Sign up for communications from Giant Tiger
  * Create a GT ID account to use when:
    * shopping online
    * interacting with our app
    * managing your communication preferences  
  

  * Make an online purchase
  * Ask us to ship an order to a store near you or a specific location
  * Ask for a refund or exchange of a product ordered
  * Sign up for our loyalty program
  * Participate in a contest or promotion through our website
  * Sign up to be part of or participate in a marketing survey or panel
  * Send us a question or complaint
  * Apply for employment with us
  * Browse on our websites

This information can include your name, email address, physical address,
payment information, telephone number, purchase details, store preferences and
communication preferences.

### How We Collect Personal Information Through Our Loyalty Program

We may collect Personal Information from you through our loyalty program when
you:

  * Enroll in Giant Tiger’s loyalty program and provide your contact information in store or online through your GT ID account
  * Download and use the loyalty program mobile application ("app")
    * We may collect Personal Information and non-personal information about your current location; your usage of the app, including offers viewed and opt-out preferences; and your device, including its unique identifier.

* Provide us with your demographic information, language, shopping preferences and communication preferences within your GT ID account
  * Provide us with your phone number or loyalty program identification number in store at checkout
  * Shop online using your GT ID account, where you have opted in to our loyalty program

### How We Collect Information Automatically Through Your Browser

We use our own and third-party technologies to collect information from you
when you interact with our websites.

While we do not require your Personal
Information in order for you to access our websites, we may collect
information about you that is not Personal Information, such as the type of
internet browser or computer operating system you are using and the domain
name of the website from which you linked to our websites.

When you view our websites, we or our third-party service provider may store
some information on your computer in the form of a "cookie" or similar file.

Cookies allow us and our third-party service providers to recognize when you
use or return to our website or how you use our website.

Under
certain circumstances, we permit these third-party service providers to
collect information on our website for their own business purposes using
cookies or other similar technologies.

Giant Tiger may tie non-personal information that we collect automatically
(such as the type of internet browser that you use) to Personal Information
that you provide to us with your consent (such as when you create or use your
GT ID account).

We use Google Analytics to collect non-personal information on visitors to our
website in order to provide us with statistics on website activity.

If you
would like to opt out of Google collecting your browsing history, please find
more information on how to do so, including how to [download their browser
add-on](https://tools.google.com/dlpage/gaoptout/).

To manage your choices for Personal Information that Giant Tiger collects,
please see the section of this Privacy Policy titled How to Make or Change
your Privacy Choices.

### Information Collected From Other Sources

We may occasionally obtain information from other sources that help us
analyze, update, expand our records and identify new guests (e.g., updating
contact information or adding demographic information).

These companies must follow privacy laws and Canada’s
Anti-Spam Legislation when collecting and sharing the information with Giant
Tiger.

For example, we use your Personal Information for the following purposes:

### Product and Service Fulfillment

  * Fulfill and manage purchases, orders, payments, returns/exchanges, or requests for information, or to otherwise serve you through our stores or websites
  * Communicate with you about your requests or purchases
  * Register and provide services related to your GT ID account
  * Provide Customer Service and provide alerts related to products available or purchased at Giant Tiger, such as product recalls
  * GT Financial services, including providing income tax, cheque cashing, and commercial credit services within select Giant Tiger stores
    * Financial information, such as T4s, may be collected and retained in order to process income taxes, in accordance with legal retention requirements  
  

  * Process orders or contact you about an order at a pharmacy located within select Giant Tiger stores
    * Personal Health Information, which is Personal Information related to your health or treatment such as your prescription information, may be collected and retained within pharmacists’ offices located within Giant Tiger stores operated by The North West Company Inc.

Please see The North West Company Inc.’s Privacy Policy for further information regarding how Personal Health Information is collected and retained in these select Giant Tiger stores: [http://www.northwest.ca/privacy.php](http://www.northwest.ca/privacy.php)  
  

  * Consider job applications
    * Personal Information you submit to us at a Giant Tiger store or through our websites in order to apply for a job, including contact information and your employment history, may be used for recruitment or employment purposes
    * If you have questions on how we protect information collected, used, or disclosed for recruitment or employment purposes, please contact our Privacy Office

### Marketing Purposes

  * Deliver coupons, promotions, sweepstakes, contests, newsletters, regular flyers, emails, as well as mobile coupons and messages you have chosen to receive
  * Send marketing communications and other information you have chosen to receive regarding products, services and promotions
  * Administer promotions
  * Administer sweepstakes and contests
    * For example, the information we collect when you participate in sweepstakes and contests could be used for marketing purposes, such as sending you offers or coupons we think you would be interested in

Giant Tiger will never send you commercial electronic messages for marketing
purposes without your consent.

### Loyalty Program

  * Enable customer enrollment in Giant Tiger’s loyalty program
  * Provide tailored offers, coupons, and other promotions to loyalty members based on specified interests or purchases
  * Perform analytics on an aggregate basis to provide better products at Giant Tiger stores and online for customers
  * Administer the loyalty program and related communication lists, including keeping up-to-date contact information, and managing consents, opt-ins or opt-outs to receive communications from Giant Tiger
    * This information will generally include your name, phone number, email, postal code, preferred store and your preferences around language and receiving email or text message communications from us
    * This information may also include (where you choose to provide it to us) your birth date, your age or age range, your gender, your shopping preferences, your clothing categories of interest (e.g., Fashion—men’s) and your household composition

### Internal Operations

  * Improve the effectiveness of our websites, stores, and website mobile experience
  * Conduct research and analysis, including focus groups and surveys to improve our product and service offerings
    * Where you opt in, we may share your contact information with our third-party research partners to contact you regarding optional participation in customer research or opinion studies  
  

  * Perform internal business and troubleshooting activities to support our core operations, such as accounting, information systems, and audit functions
  * In order to meet our legal requirements and to protect Giant Tiger from any illegal or fraudulent activities, or any activities that put the security or integrity of Giant Tiger operations, websites, stores, employees or customers, at risk.

## G. How to Access or Correct your Personal Information

When Giant Tiger collects your Personal Information, we take reasonable
measures to keep your information up to date and accurate.

## H. How to Make or Change your Privacy Choices

Giant Tiger will only collect, use or disclose your Personal Information with
your consent, for the purposes indicated at the point of collection or in this
Privacy Policy.

This includes the following:

  * When you view our websites, cookies allow us to recognize when you use or return to our website, for example, in order to tailor our website or promotions to better match your interests and preferences.
* We use Google Analytics to collect non-personal information on visitors to our website in order to provide us with statistics on website activity.

If you would like to opt-out of Google collecting your browsing history, please find more information on how to do so, including how to download their browser add-on, here: [https://tools.google.com/dlpage/gaoptout/](https://tools.google.com/dlpage/gaoptout/)
  * We embed links to other websites, including social media websites, on our Giant Tiger websites.

Please note that the privacy policies applicable to the collection of Personal
Information on those other websites may be different from this one and we have
no control or responsibility for the privacy practices of third party
websites.

When you use a social media plug-in protocol link from our website, we may use
information on your likes and interests in connection with the marketing and
promotion of our business.

Revisions may reflect changes in how we
collect, use, share and protect your Personal Information, as well as changes
in our legal or regulatory obligations.

## E. How We Share your Personal Information

Giant Tiger does not sell customer Personal Information to any other
organization or person for any reason.

Giant Tiger will only share or disclose
Personal Information to third parties in order to support Giant Tiger’s
collection or use of your information for purposes outlined in the section
titled How We Use Your Personal Information where we have received your
consent, unless otherwise required by law.

### Services Providers and Suppliers

Giant Tiger may make your Personal Information available to third-party
service providers to help us provide you with a better shopping experience and
improve our business operations.

Where Personal Information is processed by a
third-party provider, we sign agreements with those providers requiring them
to use your Personal Information in a manner consistent with this Privacy
Policy and with applicable federal and provincial privacy legislation in
Canada governing the collection, use and disclosure of your information.

Our
agreements state that any third-party providers processing Personal
Information on our behalf may only use that Personal Information for the
purposes you have consented to at the time of collection.

We take reasonable
and appropriate steps to ensure that third party providers handle this
Personal Information as securely as possible and in compliance with federal
and provincial Canadian privacy laws and is kept only for the duration they
are providing you with a product or service on our behalf, and for a
reasonable time thereafter in the event that you wish to resume service.

### Legal Requirements and Law Enforcement Disclosures

We do not disclose any Personal Information to third parties without your
consent, unless required by law, legal process, law enforcement investigation
or fraud detection and prevention.

In limited circumstances, Personal
Information may be shared in order to meet our legal requirements and to
protect Giant Tiger from any illegal or fraudulent activities, or any
activities that put the security or integrity of Giant Tiger operations,
websites, stores, employees or customers, at risk.

For example, we may need to disclose your Personal Information in order to:

  * Investigate, prevent or take action regarding suspected or actual illegal activities, including fraud or to assist government enforcement agencies
  * Enforce this Privacy Policy, investigate and defend Giant Tiger against any third-party claims or allegations, or protect the security or integrity of our websites
  * Exercise or protect the rights, property or personal safety of Giant Tiger, our users, employees, agents or others

This information may include your name, contact information, purchase details,
payment and shipping information and information collected through your
browser (such as IP address).

### Business Transfers or Mergers

In the case of a prospective or completed corporate reorganization, merger,
sale of business, transfer or other disposition of all or part of the assets
or shares of Giant Tiger (including the proceedings of bankruptcy or
insolvency), Personal Information about you and other data as described in
this Privacy Policy may be part of the transferred assets and may be shared
with the other parties to the transaction by complying with the
confidentiality requirements under applicable Canadian legislation.

Any third party to which Giant Tiger would transfer or sell its assets will
have the right to continue to use your personal and other information,
provided that they comply with applicable federal and provincial privacy
legislation in Canada governing use and disclosure of your information in such
circumstances.
